body:
Hi Chris,



Thanks for getting back to me! I am going to have a look into the Dragonfly example as it seems like a good place to start.



Now that UWG has come up, it reminds me of the first option I was looking into for this project... I was originally going to use UMI ([http://urbanmodellinginterface.ning.com/](http://urbanmodellinginterface.ning.com/)) to evaluate UHI and to quantify building energy demand in different scenarios. It seems that the inter-functionality of UMI-UWG is no longer available though.



Declan
